# PIT Results – Randoop-generated Tests

This directory stores mutation testing results for test suites
**automatically generated by Randoop**.

## Purpose
Randoop represents a **random-based test generation baseline**, commonly used
in empirical software testing studies.

## Contents (generated during CI)
- `index.html` – PIT mutation report
- `mutations.csv` – mutation status (KILLED, SURVIVED, NO_COVERAGE)
- execution logs

## Configuration
- Test generator: Randoop v4.3.3
- Time budget: 60 seconds
- Test type: regression tests
- Only Randoop-generated tests are executed

## Usage in Paper
Reported as:
> **Random test generation baseline (Randoop)**
